keyMappings:
unmap all
# quick links
map g? createTab chrome-extension://dbepggeogbaibhgnhhndojpepiihcmeb/pages/options.html#


#  Scroll down
map t scrollDown
#  Scroll up 
map n scrollUp count=2
#  Scroll to the top of the page
#scrollToTop
#  Scroll to the bottom of the page
#scrollToBottom
#  Scroll a half page down
#scrollPageDown
#  Scroll a half page up
#scrollPageUp
#  Scroll left
#scrollLeft
#  Scroll right
#scrollRight
#  Scroll all the way to the left
#scrollToLeft
#  Scroll all the way to the right
#scrollToRight
#  Reload the page
map R reload hard
#  Copy the current URL to the clipboard
#copyCurrentUrl
#  Open the clipboard's URL in the current tab
#openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
#  Open the clipboard's URL in a new tab
#openCopiedUrlInNewTab
#  Go up the URL hierarchy
map .. goUp
#  Go to root of current URL hierarchy
map !! goRoot
#  Enter insert mode
#enterInsertMode
#  Enter visual mode
#enterVisualMode
#  Enter visual line mode
#enterVisualLineMode
#  Focus the first text input on the page
#focusInput
#  Open a link in the current tab
map - LinkHints.activateMode
#  Open a link in a new tab
map _ LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
#  Open a link and switch to it
#LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab 
#  Open multiple links in a new tab
#LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue 
#  Copy a link URL to the clipboard
#LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl 
#  Follow the link labeled previous or <
map T goPrevious
#  Follow the link labeled next or >
map N goNext
#  Select the next frame on the page
#nextFrame 
#  Select the page's main/top frame
#mainFrame
#  Create a new mark
map m Marks.activateCreateMode swap
#  Go to a mark
map M Marks.activateGotoMode swap
#  Open URL, bookmark or history entry
#Vomnibar.activate 
#  Open URL, bookmark or history entry in a new tab
#Vomnibar.activateInNewTab 
#  Open a bookmark
#Vomnibar.activateBookmarks 
#  Open a bookmark in a new tab
#Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab 
#  Search through your open tabs
#Vomnibar.activateTabSelection 
#  Edit the current URL
map l Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
#  Edit the current URL and open in a new tab
map L Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

#  Enter find mode
map <s-space> enterFindMode
#  Cycle forward to the next find match
map <enter> performFind
#  Cycle backward to the previous find match
map <s-enter> performBackwardsFind
#  Go back in history
map H goBack
#  Go forward in history
map S goForward
#  Create new tab
map c createTab
#  Go one tab left
map h previousTab
#  Go one tab right
map s nextTab
#  Go to previously-visited tab
#visitPreviousTab 
#  Go to the first tab
#firstTab 
#  Go to the last tab
#lastTab 
#  Duplicate current tab
map d duplicateTab
#  Pin or unpin current tab
#togglePinTab 
#  Mute or unmute current tab
#toggleMuteTab 
#  Close current tab
map w removeTab
#  Restore closed tab
map W restoreTab
#  Move tab to new window
#moveTabToNewWindow 
#  Move tab to the left
#moveTabLeft 
#  Move tab to the right
#moveTabRight 
#  Show help
#closeOtherTabs 
#  View page source
#toggleViewSource 

map x$ closeTabsOnLeft

map x^ closeTabsOnRight

map x* closeOtherTabs

#LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
#LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
r: https://rally1.rallydev.com/#/280832722108d/search?keywords=%s
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
a: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
